kai¶

This is an Astropy affiliated package to reduce and analyze Keck NIRC2 and OSIRIS imaging data.

  • kai.extern
  • kai.mtf
    • kai.mtf.mmm

    • kai.reduce.kai_util

    • kai.reduce.reduce_template
    • kai.reduce.reduce_template_osiris
    • kai.reduce.sky

    • kai.utils.tests
